about_the_game:
Aquatico - Founder's pack provides some nifty digital-only things for players who want to go above and beyond and give extra support to us here at Digital Reef and Overseer Games.

Everything in this pack is cosmetic only and has no effect on gameplay in any way or form.

The Founder's pack includes:
  • Special edition Walker suit
  • Special Banner
  • Founder's Statue
  • Special cat
  • A very special good boy dog
  • Founder's pack Transporter
  • Vector image of the Aquatico Trident and logos for printing on T-shirts
  • 3D Print-ready Founder Walker Suit & Aquatico Keychain .stl files
detailed_description:
Aquatico - Founder's pack provides some nifty digital-only things for players who want to go above and beyond and give extra support to us here at Digital Reef and Overseer Games.

Everything in this pack is cosmetic only and has no effect on gameplay in any way or form.

The Founder's pack includes:
  • Special edition Walker suit
  • Special Banner
  • Founder's Statue
  • Special cat
  • A very special good boy dog
  • Founder's pack Transporter
  • Vector image of the Aquatico Trident and logos for printing on T-shirts
  • 3D Print-ready Founder Walker Suit & Aquatico Keychain .stl files
legal_notice: Aquatico © 2021-2022 Digital Reef Games. Developed by Digital Reef Games. Published by Overseer Games. All brands, product names, and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Made in Europe.
name: Aquatico - Founder's Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 590 6 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Aquatico - Founder's pack provides some nifty digital-only things for players who want to go above and beyond and give extra support to us here at Digital Reef and Overseer Games.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
